task.title: Open a document or template from toolbar
task.shortdesc: If a document/template is already open you can switch to or open another document / template at any time.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

step.cmd: Select the "Load button on the CWRC-Writer toolbar.
Click on the document/template you would like to open from the popup list.

taskbody.result: By selecting a document / template from the list in the pop-up a new page will be reloaded. If you have not saved your information prior to opening a different document you will lose any changes that you have made.
